mapper.insert: insert into document(name, path, abstr, type, size, publisher,publisher_dept,publisher_date,perm_id,view_count,enable_down) value(#{name},#{path},#{abstr},#{type},#{size},#{publisher},#{publisherDept}, #{publisherDate},#{permId},0,#{enableDown})
mapper.update:
update document set name = #{name},
path = #{path},
abstr = #{abstr}, type = #{type},
size = #{size},
publisher = #{publisher}, publisher_dept = #{publisherDept}, publisher_date = #{publisherDate}, perm_id = #{permId}, view_count = 0 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from document where publisher = #{publisher}
select d.*,p.name as dept_name, t.name as type_name from document d left join dept p on publisher_dept = p.id left join document_type t on type = t.id
